CustomField.formula:
IMAGE(
"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=" + BillingStreet + "," + BillingCity + "," + BillingState +" &zoom=13&size=650x250&markers=color:red|" + BillingStreet + "," + BillingCity + "," + BillingState + "&sensor=true"
, "no map available", 250, 650)
CustomField.label: Account Location
